experience: You and Andrea both know Keith Rezendes, Aric Zion, and 14 others
Representing @SHRMGP and @AzSHRM at the SHRM Volunteer Summit event at the capital yesterday! Spoke with legislators about tax reform and workplace flexibility. #shrmvls

We’ve got prep in our step in the Shop, blending feel good vibes into our everyday just like Jacob here at Queen Creek. If you can silverline-it on the daily, we'd love you on our team in Paradise Valley, opening November 2017! Stop by our new Shop for a chat - Job Fair is around the corner, November 16-18, 10am-4pm.

Think of us less as a media agency and more of a creative collective. Our experts in video production, photography, and motion graphics animation create a look that is cohesive across every platform. So whether your business posts a video or photo on your Facebook page, your customer will always be able to connect the two and get a sense of your vision. Ultimately, they will be more compelled to give you their business.  We work hand in hand  to compliment each other’s strengths with one mission in mind: to bring your brand to life and connect with your clients.Experience with producing an array of: •	On-location Video Productions•	Business videos / Commercials / Promos•	Interview / Testimonial Videos•	Training / Demonstration Videos•	Kickstarter and Crowdfunding Videos•	Product Photography•	Individual + Team Headshots•	Event Photography•	Website Landing "About Us" Video•       Documentary-styled Interviews•       B-roll Capture•       Product Videos•       How-Tos and Tutorial Videos•       Event Recap Videos•       Company Recruitment / Culture Video•       (15-30 sec) Promos / Sizzle Videos for Social Media Outlets•	Motion Graphics / Animation

•	Manage the entire video process of pre-production, production, post-production.•	Conceptualize and produce projects, from a one-person shoot to a large-scale complex shoots.•	Develop scripts and storyboards for clients and their video campaigns. •	Oversee production and coordinate video production logistics.•       Help guide a team of Digital Video Producers through the production and execution of video projects. •	Coordinate with video team on project planning and scheduling.•	Assist with training and on-boarding of new hires.•	Develop new methods for producing quality content for each company's unique brand voice and style.•	Maintain a strong understanding of current and new methods, styles, and trends.•	Working knowledge of cinema camera equipment such as C300 MK II, 1D X, Sony FS100s, and DSLRs.•	Working knowledge of 4K/UHD specifications. Experience with producing an array of: •	on-location video productions•	business videos / commercials / promos•	interview / testimonial videos•	training / demonstration videos•	website welcome videos•	Kickstarter and crowdfunding videos•	real estate property videos / tours•	custom videos•	sports videography (college recruiting, game footage, scouting, personal reels)
On occasion, I work on freelance projects around the valley. I am usually in charge of various duties from script writing, storyboarding, shooting, editing, and color correction.

As a Digital Video Producer I'm involved in: •	editing•	motion graphics•	auditioning actors / actresses / models•	voiceover / narration•	scriptwriting•	selecting music tracksI can produce an array of: •	on-location video production•	business videos / commercials•	interview / testimonial videos•	training / demonstration videos•	website welcome videos•	Kickstarter and crowdfunding videos•	real estate property videos / tours•	custom videos•	sports videography (college recruiting, game footage, scouting, personal reels)
Better Business Bureau of Central, Northern & Western Arizona

I produce any and all videos or photographs requested by BBB's Marketing and Communications department. Our focus is to visually captivate Better Business Bureau's mission of "trust in the marketplace"​ and effectively communicate to consumers and businesses about BBB's services through digital media.I manage all aspects of storyboarding, script writing, shooting, interviewing, camera/talent direction, editing, motion graphics of all our video assets.Duties include: •	Design and develop storyboards and conceptual work for live-action and motion graphics.•	Developing narratives that deliver both, BBB’s and the client’s objectives.•	Adapting to various types of shooting environments: workshops/seminars, interior and outside          events, live events, studio, and client's on site locations.•	Managing a project end-to-end and executing to strict editorial deadlines.•	Create and maintain video workflows and editorial calendars.•	Pitching ideas for future marketing efforts; video campaigns.•	Good understanding of Social Media as it relates to video distribution.•	Filming and curating raw content.•	Liaising with clients.•	Content delivery: fit for purpose and within budget.Equipment: Canon 5D Mk iii DSLR, Adobe Creative Suite, Lowell light kit, Shure lavalier microphone & TASCAM recorder.**November 2014** Employee of the Month**April 2015** Employee of the Month

recommendations: Shannon Teixeira
Shaping the practice of Modern HR, President SHRM-GP
November 15, 2017, Shannon managed Andrea directly

I had the privilege of working with Andrea for approximately a year. Working in an early stage startup environment isn’t for the faint of heart. It requires long hours, is often operationally disorganized, and runs exceptionally lean.  Andrea faced each day with a “how can I help?” mindset.  During the course of the year I saw Andrea rise often in her role, and with the team. She contributed ideas not only from a creative direction but also around increasing efficiencies with processes and procedures and as an example, created a just-in-time training program for the team to help them evolve their creative and technical skills. Over the year her contributions continued to rise and she was promoted to Creative Director due to her unwavering professionalism with clients, approach to fostering an inclusive and trusting team environment and her eye for technical and creative detail.Beyond Andrea’s ability to create an amazing team environment, her creative approach and eye for technical detail is remarkable. Often times our clients would gush about her ability to bring their vision to life in such a special way. In fact we had close to a 95% client retention rate and attribute that to Andrea’s leadership of the team, her approach with the clients and the final deliverables that often exceeded expectations. From a budget and time perspective, she worked hand in hand with operations to ensure all projects were scoped to be on time and on budget.Overall Andrea is like no other creative professional I’ve worked with. She is honest, authentic, genuine, caring, attention oriented, detailed, technical and uber creative. I would not hesitate to work with Andrea again if given the chance! I welcome anyone seeking additional information about Andrea to contact me direct.
Shannon Teixeira

Mark Christensen
WOO-Meister,  SuperConnector, Culture Warrior & People Strategist
November 13, 2017, Mark was senior to Andrea but didn’t manage directly

From the moment I met Andrea, I loved her style, her sense of fun, her true professionalism and her intuitive ability to create stories on film.  We had the opportunity to work together in a fun and cool start-up called Videoloco and as we grew from a just another cool video production company to a solid digital marketing organization, Andrea was our rising star, our creative genius, and our lead storyteller!  She led a group of at least 4-7 other creatives and led them all to produce their best work!  Where ever Andrea goes she creates "magic" and I have the opportunity to continue that journey with her and to bring my best clients/relationships to create that custom magic to tell their unique and impressive stories!
Mark Christensen

WOO-Meister,  SuperConnector, Culture Warrior & People Strategist
November 3, 2017, Mark worked with Andrea in the same group

From the first moment I met Mark, I felt this positive energy radiate from him. It is so uplifting and contagious. I've had the privilege to learn so much under his mentorship. He is enthusiastic, patient and considerate. He's always finding ways to assist the team whether or not the duty pertains to him. He has a kind soul and will always be thinking of others before himself. Ultimately, he cares about the success of all of us as a team and is one of the most loyal people I've ever worked with. My experience at Videoloco wouldn't have been the same without his words of wisdom. Can't imagine my journey without him!
Mark Christensen

summary: Through almost a decade of film/video production and digital communications experience, I've grown to understand that dedication and true commitment can get you the most amazing opportunities.  My goal is to continue to innovate no matter what the task may be and ultimately evolve into the professional I dream to be.  I'm passionate about visual storytelling and creating compelling narratives from raw to scripted content.  What drives me most, as a creative professional, is taking the journey from idea to execution, through story development, scripting, production, and post production. Brainstorming ideas and discovering out-of-the-box solutions that serve the overall vision is what feeds my soul.
name: Andrea McCracken
title: Creative Director + Co-Founder at Rollcrew
